plugins.name: Text Filler with CSV
plugins.description:
You can populate components containing multiple text elements with strings from a CSV file.

Tab-separated values are also supported, allowing copy-paste directly from Google Spreadsheet.

Rows and columns are applied in layer order, and empty cells are skipped.


複数のテキストを含むコンポーネントに CSV から文字列を流し込むことができます。

タブ区切りにも対応し、Google Spreadsheet からのコピペも対応しています。

行や列は、レイヤー順に適用され、空のセルはスキップされます。


解説記事： https://note.com/feb19/n/n17ac26f980e0
plugins.tagline: Populate components with multiple text fields from CSV automatically. 複数テキストを持つコンポーネントに文字列を自動入力できます。

plugins.name: Figma to Cape Template Designer
plugins.description:
Seamlessly Copy Figma Designs to Template Designer


🚀 Copy layers and frames from Figma directly into Template Designer.

🎨 Save time by avoiding manual recreation—copy, paste, and edit instantly.

⚡ Keep your workflow fast and efficient, focusing on design instead of tedious adjustments.

🔄 Easily update and edit imported layers, plus create unlimited formats.


Perfect for designers who want to work smarter. ✨


How to Use the Plugin

1 Select a frame or layer in Figma and click “Copy” in the plugin.

2 Open Template Designer and paste with ⌘V (or Ctrl + V on Windows).

3 Edit, update, and create multiple formats effortlessly!


Features

✅ Save Time & Work Efficiently

Skip the hassle of recreating designs—copy from Figma and start building immediately.

✅ Editable Layers

Make changes to text, images, and more within Template Designer.

✅ Unlimited Formats

Create multiple formats from a single design.

⚠️ Keep in Mind

Some advanced Figma styling elements may not be fully supported.


What is Template Designer?

Template Designer is part of Campaign Designer from Cape, a powerful tool for creating templates that generate multiple creatives. Designers can set up dynamic layers, allowing campaign managers to edit text, images and many more elements easily—making creative production faster and more scalable.


FAQ

What can I do with the plugin?

Quickly transfer your Figma designs into Template Designer without losing time on manual recreation.


Can I edit designs after pasting them?

Yes! You can edit imported layers, adjust elements, and create different formats.


Which elements are supported?

Most Figma layers, including text, shapes, and images. Some advanced styling may not be fully compatible.


What if I encounter an issue?

Let us know at Cape Support—we’re happy to help! ⚡️


This plugin helps designers work faster, update designs easily, and create scalable templates. Try it now and boost your workflow! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Transform Figma Designs into Template Designer templates

plugins.name: Variable JSON
plugins.description:
"Variable JSON – Seamlessly Export Figma Variables to JSON"


Quickly convert your Figma variables into clean JSON with Variable JSON. Select your Collection, Group, and Mode, generate the JSON, and copy it instantly—perfect for streamlining design-to-development workflows.


How to Use:

  1. Open Variable JSON: In Figma, go to Plugins > Variable JSON.
  2. Select Variables: Choose the Collection, Group, and Mode (e.g., Light, Dark, or Custom).
  3. Generate JSON: Click "GEN JSON" to create the JSON output based on your selection.
  4. Copy JSON: Click copy button and use it in your projects.


Effortless variable exporting starts here! 🚀

accepted.description: We integrate strategy, technology, and creativity to deliver a better solutions to our clients.

  1. Open Variable JSON: In Figma, go to Plugins > Variable JSON.
  2. Select Variables: Choose the Collection, Group, and Mode (e.g., Light, Dark, or Custom).
  3. Generate JSON: Click "GEN JSON" to create the JSON output based on your selection.

Effortless variable exporting starts here! 🚀

plugins.name: Icon Resizer
plugins.description:
The Icon Resizer Plugin is a powerful tool designed for designers who need to resize and create multiple versions of icons quickly and efficiently. Whether you’re working on UI/UX design, branding, or graphic design, the plugin helps streamline the process of resizing icons into various sizes while maintaining design integrity.

The plugin allows users to duplicate and resize selected icons to predefined sizes (e.g., 16px, 24px, 32px, 40px, 48px) with just a few clicks. You can choose a single size or add up to five different sizes in one go.
plugins.tagline: Resize, Reimagine, and Revitalize Your Icons in a Snap!

118276.name: Icon Resizer
118276.description:
The Icon Resizer Plugin is a powerful tool designed for designers who need to resize and create multiple versions of icons quickly and efficiently. Whether you’re working on UI/UX design, branding, or graphic design, the plugin helps streamline the process of resizing icons into various sizes while maintaining design integrity.

The plugin allows users to duplicate and resize selected icons to predefined sizes (e.g., 16px, 24px, 32px, 40px, 48px) with just a few clicks. You can choose a single size or add up to five different sizes in one go.
118276.tagline: Resize, Reimagine, and Revitalize Your Icons in a Snap!

plugins.name: Banner Framer
plugins.description:
EN description below


バナーサイズの整理をもっと簡単に!!


バナー作成する際、Figmaでのフレームサイズを管理する面倒なストレスを解消します！！Banner Framerを使えば、サイズを忘れたり、フレームの名前を何度も変更する必要がなくなります〜！


Banner Framerの特徴：

•幅と高さを入力するだけでフレームを簡単に生成。

•サイズ情報が含まれた名前を自動で付けて整理をサポート。

•作業効率を上げ、手作業によるミスを軽減。


近日公開：

•サイズプリセットの保存: チームでよく使うバナーサイズを保存して簡単に再利用。

•ワンクリック生成: 保存したサイズをチェックボックスで選択し、瞬時にフレームを生成！

---------------------

Making banner size organization much easier.


Designing banners often requires juggling multiple frame sizes—a task that’s not only repetitive but prone to errors. With Banner Framer, you’ll never forget a size or have to rename frames over and over again.


What Banner Framer does:

•Generate frames effortlessly by entering width and height.

•Automatically name frames with their dimensions for better organization.

•Streamline your workflow and reduce manual errors.


Coming soon:

•Reusable size presets: Save your team’s go-to banner sizes for easy access.

•One-click creation: Select saved sizes with a checkbox and generate frames instantly!
plugins.tagline: Batch-create and customize frames with ease!

plugins.name: Sri lankan Name Generator
plugins.description: This plugin allows users to generate unique Sri Lankan names based on gender and ethnicity. It's ideal for creating culturally relevant and diverse placeholder names for mockups, wireframes, or design projects. Users can select from Sinhala, Tamil, Muslim, or Burgher names for both genders, ensuring inclusivity and variety in your designs. Easily apply names to text layers with just a few clicks!

plugins.name: 角落艺术家
plugins.description:
In the new version of "Corner Artist," I've added a language switch feature between Chinese and English. Here, you can freely switch to your preferred language as needed.


The new version optimizes the user experience, making the overall UI more refined and convenient.


By clicking the button, you can randomly switch to your favorite gradient colors.

Additionally, the new version introduces a "Random Corner Radius" feature, allowing you to choose the layer you want to modify and adjust the corner radius strength.


Here, the higher the value, the smaller the corner radius strength.


I’ve used the superellipse corner radius formula:

|x/a|^n + |y/b|^n = 1

When n = 2, it’s a regular ellipse;

When n < 2, it’s a superellipse;

The smaller the value of n, the closer the corners are to right angles.


For those interested, you can explore the formula on your own; I’ll post it in the comments.

When you choose a corner radius strength less than 1, you'll also receive stars as a bonus.


That's about it for the new features. Feel free to experience and save them!
plugins.tagline: Making the overall UI more refined and convenient.

113419.name: 角落艺术家

plugins.name: Avctoris Copyright
plugins.description:
The Avctoris Copyright plugin for Figma is a comprehensive tool designed to help creators protect and manage their intellectual property rights effortlessly. With this plugin, users can seamlessly generate a PDF certificate of their design work directly from their Figma workspace, ensuring that their creations are legally safeguarded.


Key Features:


Automated PDF Generation: Export your design assets into a PDF format for easy documentation and protection.

Intellectual Property Management: Record detailed information about the authors and holders of rights for each creation.

Secure Registration: Easily submit your work for copyright registration and receive a certificate, ensuring your designs are legally protected.

User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive UI integrated into Figma, allowing for a smooth and seamless experience.

Real-Time Collaboration: Continue collaborating on designs while managing copyrights without leaving Figma.
plugins.tagline: Where Ideas Come to Life

plugins.name: Swift Layer Exporter
plugins.description:
Manage the layers you want to export based on their name. Just add the file type extension (.jpg, .png, .svg, .pdf) to any layer. With the plugin open select any layer or any parent and all of the tagged layers will automatically be found to export.


You can also set the export scale by adding a percent 200% after the extension. You can also set the layer cropping to its native bounding box with the tag = or to the base frame with #.


  1. button.png # 200% - exports the layer button as a png at 200% in the size of the layout base frame.
  2. button.svg = 100% - exports the layer button as a svg at 100% in the size of the layer.
plugins.tagline: Manage export layers by name

124254.name: Swift Layer Exporter
124254.description:
Manage the layers you want to export based on their name. Just add the file type extension (.jpg, .png, .svg, .pdf) to any layer. With the plugin open select any layer or any parent and all of the tagged layers will automatically be found to export.


You can also set the export scale by adding a percent 200% after the extension. You can also set the layer cropping to its native bounding box with the tag = or to the base frame with #.


  1. button.png # 200% - exports the layer button as a png at 200% in the size of the layout base frame.
  2. button.svg = 100% - exports the layer button as a svg at 100% in the size of the layer.

plugins.name: Private Comments – Personal Notes in Figma

The first-of-its-kind plugin that lets you add private comments to any frame or layer in your file.


Whether you're jotting reminders, tracking feedback, or planning edits — Private Comments help you stay organized without cluttering your file or notifying your team.

✅ Mark as done / not done

🧠 Keep thoughts to yourself — No public comments or notifications

Perfect for noting feedback, internal critiques, or just managing your mental checklist or ideas directly inside Figma.

plugins.name: Frame Manager
plugins.description:
A simple but powerful tool for organizing and fixing frames in Figma. Detect duplicates, fix naming issues, and ensure proper dimensions in your design files.

Full Description

Frame Manager helps you maintain clean and well-organized Figma files by providing essential tools for working with frames.

Key Features:

🔍 Duplicate Frame Detection & Removal

Instantly find frames with identical names

Option to automatically remove duplicates while keeping one instance

Clean up messy files by eliminating redundant elements

🏷️ Frame Name Standardization

Identify frames with non-standard naming conventions

Automatically fix frame names to follow consistent PascalCase format

Enforce naming consistency across your design system

📏 Size Optimization

Find frames with dimensions not divisible by 2

Fix frame sizes to ensure clean rendering on various displays

Find frames with non-power-of-2 dimensions for texture optimization

How It Works

Install the plugin and run it from the Plugins menu

Select the feature you need from the simple, intuitive interface

Get instant feedback as the plugin detects issues or fixes problems

Enjoy a cleaner, more organized Figma file

Perfect For

Design teams working on large files

Designers preparing assets for developers

Anyone who wants to maintain consistent naming and sizing in their designs

Technical Details

Lightweight and fast - analyzes your file without lag

Non-destructive - always gives you control over changes

Works with any Figma file containing frames

Maintain better design hygiene and save hours of manual cleanup with Frame Manager!


2025 - WildCard Studios - Art Department
plugins.tagline: Clean & organize frames: find duplicates, fix names, proper dimensions with one-click solutions.

📏 Size Optimization

Find frames with dimensions not divisible by 2

Fix frame sizes to ensure clean rendering on various displays

Find frames with non-power-of-2 dimensions for texture optimization

How It Works

Install the plugin and run it from the Plugins menu

Select the feature you need from the simple, intuitive interface

Get instant feedback as the plugin detects issues or fixes problems

Enjoy a cleaner, more organized Figma file

Perfect For

Design teams working on large files

Designers preparing assets for developers

Anyone who wants to maintain consistent naming and sizing in their designs

Technical Details

Lightweight and fast - analyzes your file without lag

Non-destructive - always gives you control over changes

Works with any Figma file containing frames

Maintain better design hygiene and save hours of manual cleanup with Frame Manager!


2025 - WildCard Studios - Art Department
128090.tagline: Clean & organize frames: find duplicates, fix names, proper dimensions with one-click solutions.

plugins.name: Link Spacing & Radius Variables (Alpha)
plugins.description:
One-click application of variables to selected objects


Important: Variable Requirements

1. Variables must be in an external library (local variables are not supported yet)

2. The library must be connected to your file


Variable Naming Requirements:

For Spacing:

- Format: `space-{number}`

- Examples: `space-4`, `space-8`, `space-16`, `space-24`

- Variable value must match the number in the name

For Radius:

- Format: `radius-{number}`

- Examples: `radius-4`, `radius-8`, `radius-16`

- Variable value must match the number in the name


Collection Requirements:

- Spacing collection must include the word "spacing" in its name

- Radius collection must include the word "radius" or "border-radius" in its name


How to Prepare Your File

1. Connect the variable library:

- Open "Team Library" menu

- Find the required library

- Enable the toggle next to the "Variables" section

2. Ensure objects are prepared:

- For spacing: objects must use Auto Layout

- For radius: objects must support the cornerRadius property


How to Use

1. Select objects you want to apply variables to

2. Launch the plugin

3. Choose the desired collection from the dropdown (marked with 📚 icon)

4. Click "Apply spacing" or "Apply radius"
plugins.tagline: Link spacing and radius variables

plugins.name: WCAG Contrast Checker|🔎 تحليل التباين وفقًا لـ WCAG
plugins.description:
في تجربة المستخدم، وضوح النصوص على الخلفيات يلعب دورًا أساسيًا في ضمان قراءة مريحة وسهلة للجميع، بما في ذلك الأشخاص ذوي الإعاقة البصرية. وهنا يأتي دور معايير WCAG التي تحدد نسبة التباين المثلى بين النص والخلفية.


💡 كيف يعمل البلغين؟

📌 حدد النص والخلفية داخل Figma، ثم اضغط على “تحليل التباين”. سيقوم البلغين بحساب نسبة التباين وإظهار تنبيه فوري يخبرك إن كان التباين متوافقًا أو غير متوافق وفقًا لمعايير WCAG.


✅ لماذا هذا مهم؟

✔️ يضمن وضوح النصوص وتحسين تجربة القراءة.

✔️ يساعد المصممين في تحقيق معايير إمكانية الوصول (Accessibility).

✔️ يختصر الوقت في اختبار الألوان داخل التصميم.
plugins.tagline: WCAG Contrast Checker|🔎 تحليل التباين وفقًا لـ WCAG

plugins.name: Contrastio - Contrast & Accessibility Checker
plugins.description:
Contrastio helps you create more inclusive designs by automatically checking your work against WCAG accessibility guidelines.


🎯 Instant Accessibility Scanning

Check entire pages or specific frames with one click

Get real-time feedback on accessibility issues

Smart element exclusion with prefix system


📊 Comprehensive Checks

Color contrast validation (WCAG 2.0 & 2.1)

Typography accessibility analysis

Support for all compliance levels (A, AA, AAA)

Text readability assessment


🚀 Designer-Friendly Workflow

One-click element highlighting

Clear violation explanations

Grouped similar issues for easy fixes


⚡ Efficient & Fast

Scan thousands of elements in seconds

Stay in your design flow

No external tools needed


Why Contrastio?

Whether you're designing for government websites, enterprise applications, or simply want to create more inclusive designs, Contrastio helps ensure your work meets accessibility standards from the start.


Free Version Includes:

Up to 2,000 node scans per month


Pro Version ($4.99) Adds:

Unlimited node scanning

All new features coming along like reporting, screen/color modes.
plugins.tagline: Instant WCAG accessibility checks for your Figma designs

plugins.name: Conjure - AI based text generator
plugins.description:
Introduction


Use your OpenAI API key with this plugin to quickly generate text for your designs. The plugin can allows to generate multiple text layers based on the content. Furthermore, it can also group the layers by their names, allowing you to use the layer names in the prompt to further elaborate how you want the data to be filled in.


How to use


The plugin was primarily created for 2 use cases:


1. Generate variations of a single type of data:

  1. Select all the text layers that show the same type of data and you want to generate variations of it. Imagine Name, City, Stock price, etc.
  2. Make sure 'Group by layer name' is OFF.
  3. Add details to the prompt to explain the type of content you want to be generated for the selected fields. Giving examples and formatting is also helpful.
  4. Click generate and it will fill the information!



2. Generate variations of multiple types of data:

  1. Select all the frames or components that you want to fill using this plugin.
  2. Turn ON 'Group by layer name'. The plugin will show you the layer names found.
  3. Add details to the prompt to explain the type of content you want to be generated for the selected fields. You can use the layer names to add specific context. Giving examples and formatting is also helpful.
  4. Click generate and it will fill the information!


3. Generated related data

You can use the group by layer name to select singular text layers which are related. An example is when you need text for First name, Last name, DoB, role, location and relatives. The plugin will try to generate related content for these layers.


Note


1. This plugin needs an OpenAI API Key to work.

2. I will recommend naming your text layers appropriately if you plan to use the Group by layer name feature. You can use it without naming the layers, but sometimes this might result in unexpected results.
plugins.tagline: OpenAI powered text generator with batch text generation feature

118471.name: Conjure - AI based text generator
118471.description:

Use your OpenAI API key with this plugin to quickly generate text for your designs. The plugin can allows to generate multiple text layers based on the content. Furthermore, it can also group the layers by their names, allowing you to use the layer names in the prompt to further elaborate how you want the data to be filled in.


How to use


The plugin was primarily created for 2 use cases:

  2. Make sure 'Group by layer name' is OFF.
  3. Add details to the prompt to explain the type of content you want to be generated for the selected fields. Giving examples and formatting is also helpful.
  4. Click generate and it will fill the information!



2. Generate variations of multiple types of data:

  1. Select all the frames or components that you want to fill using this plugin.
  2. Turn ON 'Group by layer name'. The plugin will show you the layer names found.

plugins.name: Text binder for AI
plugins.description:
Text Binder for AI

A LLM-optimized plugin that lets you enhance text content with AI while preserving your Figma designs. Built with AI guardrails, this plugin safely extracts, processes, and updates text across multiple frames without breaking layouts or losing design fidelity.


✨ Key Features

🎯 AI-Ready Content Extraction

  1. Extract text with reference tags for LLM processing
  2. Maintain exact positioning and styling information
  3. Process multiple frames simultaneously
  4. Built-in prompts and guardrails for AI safety


🔄 Validated Content Updates

  1. Preview AI-generated changes before applying
  2. Intelligent length validation for layout preservation
  3. Real-time status checks for each text element
  4. Clear warnings for potential layout impacts


🚀 Getting Started

  1. Select your target frames
  2. Extract text with AI-friendly reference tags
  3. Use any LLM while maintaining the safety tags
  4. Review changes with automatic validation
  5. Apply updates with confidence
plugins.tagline: AI-enhanced, design-protected

plugins.name: Export Frame 2 Json
plugins.description:
A plugin to customize the information of the elements in the Frame export json file .


一个将Frame里的元素信息自定义导出json文件的插件。


可以将模版内的结构梳理成 background 背景层、foreground 前景层 和 medias 媒体资源（用户替换图片的层）。

Tips: 在交付版本中，模版内的元素（包括文字）都可以转换成图片，避免出现旋转缩放等参数，这样更好定位元素大小和位置。

图层命名前缀可以用模版名称，后缀命名规则如下：

  1. 背景层用「bg」
  2. 媒体资源用「mask」
  3. 前景素材用「sticker」（文字目前暂时转成图片用sticker命名）
  4. 同类型用序号区分。

导出的内容统一使用.png格式即可。
plugins.tagline: A plugin to customize the information of the elements in the Frame export json file .

114673.description:

  3. 前景素材用「sticker」（文字目前暂时转成图片用sticker命名）
  4. 同类型用序号区分。

plugins.name: Find Word Duplicates Ninja
plugins.description:
Find Word Duplicate Ninja is your reliable assistant for quickly spotting and managing duplicate words within your designs.


Key Features:


Duplicate Word Detection:

Instantly find duplicate words across all text layers.


Automatic Highlighting:

Automatically highlights all occurrences of duplicate words for easy identification.


Customizable Settings:

Adjust minimum word length to match your specific project needs.


Seamless Navigation:

Click a duplicate word tag to navigate directly to all its occurrences within your design.


Intuitive User Interface:

Stylish, user-friendly interface with well-designed tags for optimal usability.


Performance Optimized:

Efficiently handles large files without slowing down Figma's performance.


Why Choose Find Word Duplicate Ninja?


Boost Productivity:

Quickly catch duplicate words, save time, and streamline your workflow.


Improve Consistency:

Ensure consistent text throughout your project without any overlooked duplications.


Easy to Use:

Intuitive and straightforward interface suitable for designers of all levels.

plugins.name: Figma Instance Mode
plugins.description:
Inspired by this post: Please add an "Instance Selection" mode - Share an idea - Figma Community Forum


🔶 Introducing Figma Instance Mode


- ⤴️ Select Instance

- ✅ Instance Mode On

- 🚫 Instance Mode Off


⤴️ Select Instance


check if there is a parent or ancestor instance with your selection, and then will redirect your selection to the instance


It is the same as the official feature named `select instance`, but with this plugin you can blind a hotkey to this feature.


✅ Instance Mode On


Once you run this command, every time when you change your selection in Figma will run the `⤴️ Select Instance` command automatically which means you will always select the instance if your selection is within a instance.


And there will be a inspect window to show the program running result, you can get information with it.


🚫 Instance Mode Off


This feature is to turn off the instance mode, and close the inspect window


🔶 How to add GLOBAL SHORTCUT in MacOS


Check the tutorial: Custom-shortcuts-in-figma by Jussi Virtanen


MacOS Global Shortcut Path:


Plugins->Saved plugins->Figma Instance Mode->⤴️ Select Instance


Plugins->Saved plugins->Figma Instance Mode->✅ Instance Mode On


Plugins->Saved plugins->Figma Instance Mode->🚫 Instance Mode Off

accepted.name: RyanHuang 👀
accepted.description:
🔸 Product Designer
🔸 Heavy user of Figma
🔸 Beginner in FE

plugins.tagline: Selecting parent/ancestor instances automatically

- ✅ Instance Mode On

- 🚫 Instance Mode Off


⤴️ Select Instance


check if there is a parent or ancestor instance with your selection, and then will redirect your selection to the instance


It is the same as the official feature named `select instance`, but with this plugin you can blind a hotkey to this feature.


✅ Instance Mode On


Once you run this command, every time when you change your selection in Figma will run the `⤴️ Select Instance` command automatically which means you will always select the instance if your selection is within a instance.


And there will be a inspect window to show the program running result, you can get information with it.


🚫 Instance Mode Off

MacOS Global Shortcut Path:


Plugins->Saved plugins->Figma Instance Mode->⤴️ Select Instance

plugins.name: Unidup
plugins.description:
Create a design set template that includes component usage and color schemes. With this plugin, you can duplicate your template to a new page, automatically apply new instances of the original component's new variants under consistent layers, and create brand new color schemes.


Additionally, color schemes can be exported in JSON format.



Document Preparation


Document Structure: Prepare the design drafts of the design scheme, which should include "Components Page" and "Template Page", as well as "Color Scheme".


Naming: Each reuse of the design scheme should have a unique name, let's tentatively call it "NAME". This naming is very important as it runs through the entire reuse process.


Template Page: The "Template Page" is the page of your design scheme, and its name should be called NAME. It will play a big role in subsequent work, transforming into various new outputs and serving various new purposes. Therefore, each artboard should contain instances of components for reuse.


Components Page: Each time the design scheme is reused, the output should be unique. The "Components Page" contains unique elements in each set of outputs, and each component should include variants, with the key of the variant being "name" and the value being NAME, to correspond with each set of outputs.


Color Scheme: The naming method for local color schemes in figma is xxx/xxx. When naming, please follow the structure NAME/color1, NAME/color2.



How to Use


Duplicate and Export JSON are two main functions.


Duplicate:

There are three cards in the interface, namely "Components Page", "From Template", and "New Page Naming".


  1. Select your "Components Page", click the "Apply Selected Page" button to the right of "Components Page", and the card will display the details of the "Components Page".
  2. Select your "Template Page", click the "Apply Selected Page" button to the right of "From template", and the card will display the details of the "Template Page".
  3. In the "New Page Naming" card, name your new output.
  4. Click the "Duplicate" button, and you have extended a new output from the "Template Page". Modify the associated components and color scheme, and this output is ready.



Export JSON:

It will list the NAME of all your output schemes, click to export the rgba color values, and download the json to your local.




See usage demo file:

https://www.figma.com/file/jUg3U53QSIzWBEn0RfUdB0/
plugins.tagline: Unidup - An easy way to reuse your design set

plugins.name: Components Explorer
plugins.description:
Component Explorer allows you to easily locate and manage all your components, both local and remote, and easily find all their instances.


**Key Features:**


• View all your components in one place, organized by name or grouped by page


• Quickly filter between local and remote components


• Find specific components with instant search


• Locate all instances of a component with a single click


• Navigate directly to any component or instance in your document


Thanks for your feedback!


https://buymeacoffee.com/4bulxx2uho

accepted.name: Alex Salmerón
accepted.description: Hello! 🚀 I'm Alex Salmerón, a Product Designer (UX/UI) specializing in Design Systems.

plugins.tagline: Locate and manage your components and instances effortlessly

plugins.name: Paste Data
plugins.description:
🧩 Paste CSV into Text Layers

Paste tabular data directly into selected Figma text layers. Supports Excel or CSV data, auto-detects rows or columns, and applies values instantly.


🧠 Smart paste detection: one row = horizontal; multiple rows = vertical

💡 Works with grouped/frames/nested selections

⚡ Designed for quick content updates and data-driven designs
plugins.tagline: Paste Multiple Rows and Columns of Data into Table Cells

plugins.name: Design Feedback Lite
plugins.description: Instantly review selected frames using core UX principles. Get structured feedback, radar scoring, and real-time insights — all powered by design psychology.
plugins.tagline: Instant UX feedback on your designs — backed by psychology.

126473.name: Design Feedback Lite
126473.description: Instantly review selected frames using core UX principles. Get structured feedback, radar scoring, and real-time insights — all powered by design psychology.
126473.release_notes:
✨ Viewport-aware analysis: Mobile and desktop designs now get context-appropriate feedback.

⚠️ Contrast issues now tiered: Low, medium, and high severity for better prioritization.

💡 Smart Mode improved: Skips system layers like status bars, navs, and menu bars.

🧠 Accessibility standard toggle: Choose between WCAG 2.1 AA and AAA.

🎯 Refined touch and text size rules: Based on device context and layer type.

🎨 Sleek new UI: Modern layout, grouped controls, and better legibility.

Small plugin. Big feedback. Smarter than ever.
126473.tagline: Instant UX feedback on your designs — backed by psychology.

plugins.name: Stockpress
plugins.description:
About

Welcome to the Stockpress plugin for Figma, where you can quickly find and add files from your Stockpress workspace to your Figma designs. Once ready, export Frames and images back to Stockpress - complete with Frame URLs for easy access to working files!


What is Stockpress?

Stockpress is a refreshingly simple Digital Asset Management system–for everyone. One centralized workspace to add, organize, collaborate on, and share files with unlimited users and teams.


How to get started:

  1. First, sign up for a Stockpress workspace (get started for free!)
  2. Upload or import your files and folders to get organized
  3. Install the Stockpress plugin for Figma and connect your account
  4. Easily add files from Stockpress to your Figma designs
  5. Export Frames, images, and/or Frame URLs back to Stockpress


For help, contact us through your in-workspace chat or email us at help@stockpress.co
plugins.tagline: Add files from your Stockpress workspace to your design and export Figma assets back once ready

plugins.name: Design Challenge Generator | For Beginners in Design
plugins.description:
Design Challenge Generator gives you random UI, UX, and Graphics challenges to practice and improve your skills. Perfect for beginners and experienced designers alike! Generate prompts, pick your favorite, and start designing.


How to Use:

  1. Open the plugin
  2. Select a category (UI, UX, or Graphics).
  3. Click "Generate" to get a random challenge.
  4. Keep generating until you find one you like.
  5. Copy it to Figma and start designing!
  6. Share the design with your friends and don't forget to tag me.


Thanks🤍

accepted.name: Muhammed Fuwad
accepted.description: I am a self taught creative and self-driven design professional with 4+ years of experience creating and delivering design solutions and grow brands.

plugins.tagline: Practice. Improve. Design Better.
